title: Portfolio without context
context: Composite of early-career designers and analysts whose portfolios showcased visuals but not reasoning.
session_flow: Reviewed existing portfolio and highlighted where problem, role and result were missing.
Created captions that linked constraints, metrics and learning for each project.
Practised walkthroughs to build confidence explaining choices live.
boundary_and_consent: Coachee determined which client details needed masking before case studies were shared or rehearsed.
timeframe: 4 sessions over 5 weeks with async feedback on slides and scripts.
shift: They could articulate thinking and trade-offs rather than leaning on visuals alone.
outcome: Reviewers commented on clarity of process and invited them to deeper portfolio interviews.
disclaimer: Composite illustration; results depend on opportunity context.
